feed.title: Home
feed.subtitle: A Vancouver based Full Stack Developer.

entry.title: Reservation Management Spreasheet
entry.content:
Task:

Create a google sheet that can import a CSV of reservation data in an idempotent way and then display in various query views.

Stack:

  • Backend: Google Sheets with Google Script
entry.summary: Task: Create a google sheet that can import a CSV of reservation data in an idempotent way and then display in various query views.

entry.title: Java Robot App
entry.content:
Task:

Create a Windows app that can drive the UI of various other programs to generate report documents.

Stack:

  • Framework: JavaFX
  • Libraries: SikuliX, JSON Simple
entry.summary: Task: Create a Windows app that can drive the UI of various other programs to generate report documents.

entry.title: Google Sheet Backend Integration
entry.content:
Task:

Create an integration that allows an existing node app to use google sheets as a database.

Stack:

  • Backend: Node
  • Frontend: React
  • Database: Google sheets
entry.summary: Task: Create an integration that allows an existing node app to use google sheets as a database.

entry.title: Surveys App
entry.content:
Task:

Create a Web Application that can create, distribute, and analyze surveys.

Stack:

  • Backend: Laravel
  • Frontend: Vue.js
  • Database: MySQL
  • Infrastructure: AWS EC2 managed by Laravel Forge
entry.summary: Task: Create a Web Application that can create, distribute, and analyze surveys.

entry.title: Hardware Build Monitor
entry.content:
Task:

Create physical build monitor with lights that indicate the current Jenkins build status.

Stack:

  • Backend: Node/Jenkins
  • Frontend: Wooden box with color LEDs
  • Infrastructure: Raspberry PI
entry.summary: Task: Create physical build monitor with lights that indicate the current Jenkins build status.

entry.title: Hotel Booking API
entry.content:
Task:

Create an API that can provide pass-through access to 3 different hotel booking providers.

Stack:

  • Backend: Symfony4
  • Frontend: JSON endpoints
  • Database: MySQL
  • Infrastructure: Docker container on Amazon ECS
entry.summary: Task: Create an API that can provide pass-through access to 3 different hotel booking providers.

entry.title: Slack Code Reviews Bot
entry.content:
Task:

Create a slack bot that can monitor a code reviews channel and record posts asking for code reviews as well as who reviewed which posts.

Stack:

  • Backend: Node
  • Frontend: Slack
  • Database: SQLite
  • Infrastructure: Raspberry PI
entry.summary: Task: Create a slack bot that can monitor a code reviews channel and record posts asking for code reviews as well as who reviewed which posts.

entry.title: Wedding Website
entry.content:
Task:

Create a static page wedding website hosted in Amazon S3.

Stack:

  • Frontend: HTML with Skeleton CSS
  • Infrastructure: AWS S3
entry.summary: Task: Create a static page wedding website hosted in Amazon S3.
